    • Human

      public Human​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation)
      Constructor for a new Human. The texturedModel needs to be already on the graphic memory.

      position - Position of the Human in world coordinates
      rotation - rotation of the Human
